short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to copy plain text to clipboard with context menu or by toolbar icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension allows to copy to clipboard just plain text without styling and formatting. Has 3 copy methods. Has 'force plain text copy' option.
